item.title: 气象学家警告 "炸弹气旋 "来袭，冬季风暴 "艾萨拉 "阻断美国旅行
item.description: 周一，冬季风暴 "艾斯拉 "连续第三天扰乱了美国东北部、中西部和五大湖区的假日出行，造成数千次航班延误和数百次航班取消，航空公司争先恐后地恢复航班，气象学家警告说，酝酿中的 "炸弹气旋 "可能会在新年假期前进一步阻碍出行。【原文：Winter Storm Ezra disrupted holiday travel across the U.S. Northeast, Midwest and Great Lakes for a third straight day on Monday, causing thousands of flight delays and hundreds of cancellations as airlines scrambled to recover and meteorologists warned of a brewing "bomb cyclone" that could further snarl trips ahead of the New Year's holiday.】

item.title: 银行在年底压力下利用美联储流动性工具
item.description: 纽约联储的数据显示，周一美联储的一个重要隔夜流动性工具的使用量有所增加。【原文：A key Federal Reserve overnight liquidity facility saw increased use on Monday, data from the New York Fed showed.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，英国章鱼能源公司接近出售克拉肯公司股份
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）援引消息人士的话报道，章鱼能源集团（Octopus Energy Group）即将出售其软件部门克拉肯科技公司（Kraken Technologies）的大量股份，这笔交易对该公司的估值将达到 90 亿至 100 亿美元。【原文：Octopus Energy Group is close to selling a significant stake in its software unit, Kraken Technologies, in a deal that would value the business at $9 billion to $10 billion, Sky News reported, citing sources.】

item.title: 独家报道巴西大豆贸易公司将放弃亚马逊保护协议
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的人士告诉路透社，世界上一些最大的大豆贸易商正准备打破他们达成的协议，停止砍伐亚马逊雨林，以维护巴西第一大农业州的税收优惠。【原文：Some of the world's largest soybean traders are preparing to break their agreement to curb deforestation of the Amazon rainforest to preserve tax benefits in Brazil's top farm state, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: NAR 称美国 11 月成屋待售激增至近三年来最高水平
item.description: 美国全国房地产经纪人协会（National Association of Realtors）周一表示，由于经济承受能力的改善吸引了大量买家，11 月份美国旧房购买合同出人意料地创下了近三年来的最高纪录。【原文：Contracts to purchase previously owned U.S. homes unexpectedly shot to the highest in nearly three years in November, as improving affordability conditions drew in buyers, the National Association of Realtors said on Monday.】

item.title: 两家中国航空公司计划购买价值高达 82 亿美元的空客飞机
item.description: 据证券交易所文件显示，中国春秋航空和吉祥航空周一分别宣布了购买30架和25架空客A320系列喷气机的计划。【原文：China's Spring Airlines and Juneyao Airlines on Monday announced plans to buy 30 and 25 Airbus A320-family jets respectively, according to stock exchange filings.】

item.title: Verisk pulls plug on $2.4 billion AccuLynx deal
item.description: Data analytics firm Verisk said on Monday it had pulled the plug on its planned $2.35 billion acquisition of roofing software maker AccuLynx.

item.title: Lululemon founder launches proxy fight for board changes, WSJ reports
item.description: Lululemon Athletica's founder Chip Wilson has launched a proxy fight for a board shakeup, days after the apparel maker announced the exit of CEO Calvin McDonald, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Nvidia takes $5 billion stake in Intel under September agreement
item.description: Nvidia has purchased Intel shares worth $5 billion, the American semiconductor firm said in a filing on Monday, carrying out a transaction announced in September.

item.title: 2026 年美国经济将面临重大税制变革
item.description: 经济学家认为，特朗普的 "一个美丽的大法案 "中的减税措施是 2026 年美国经济的主要推动力，无论是对个人还是企业都是如此。以下是有关减税的一些细节。【原文：Economists see the tax cuts in Trump's One Big Beautiful Bill as a principal driver of the U.S. economy in 2026, both for individuals and businesses. Here's some detail about what's in store.】

item.title: 美国股指期货在上周反弹后走低，本周假期缩短
item.description: 美国股指期货周一下滑，在上周 S&P 500 指数和道指创下收盘纪录新高后，本年度最后一个假期缩短的交易周以下跌拉开序幕。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Monday, kicking off the final holiday-shortened trading week of the year on a lower note, after the S&P 500 and the Dow had closed at record highs last week.】

item.title: 药片、TikTok 和减肥应用程序：GLP-1s 消费者驱动的未来
item.description: 如果向医疗保健行业的高管们询问未来减肥药市场的情况，他们会打这样的比方：像流媒体视频会员一样按月订购 GLP-1 药物；通过智能手机应用程序管理剂量决定；像购买一双耐克鞋一样方便地获取药物。【原文：Ask executives in the healthcare industry about the future market for weight-loss drugs and the analogies are telling: monthly GLP-1 medicine subscriptions like a streaming video membership; dose decisions managed on a smartphone app; access made as easy as buying a pair of Nikes.】

item.title: 美国经济将搭乘减税顺风车，但也面临风险
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的减税政策、关税不确定性的降低、人工智能的蓬勃发展以及美联储年末的降息，2025 年美国经济的拉锯战似乎将在 2026 年结束。【原文：A see-saw year for the U.S. economy in 2025 looks set to give way to a stronger 2026 thanks to tailwinds from President Donald Trump's tax cuts, less uncertainty around tariffs, the ongoing artificial intelligence boom and a late-year run of interest-rate reductions from the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 独家：现代汽车无力回购俄罗斯汽车厂
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，由于乌克兰战事持续不断，韩国现代汽车公司无法回购其在俄罗斯的前制造工厂，因为回购选择权似乎将在下个月到期。【原文：South Korean automaker Hyundai is not in a position to repurchase its former manufacturing plant in Russia due to the continuing war in Ukraine, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters, as a buyback option appears set to expire next month.】

item.title: 俄罗斯亿万富翁波塔宁收购云计算供应商 Selectel 少数股权
item.description: 俄罗斯亿万富翁弗拉基米尔-波塔宁（Vladimir Potanin）通过他控制的公司收购了一家顶级 IT 基础设施供应商 25% 的股份，其中一家公司 T-Technologies 周一表示。【原文：Russian billionaire Vladimir Potanin has acquired a 25% stake in a top IT infrastructure provider through companies he controls, one of the firms, T-Technologies, said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国吸引外国投资者，两只中国旗舰 ETF 在泰国推出
item.description: 中国最大的交易所交易基金提供商华夏基金管理有限公司（华夏基金）周一表示，该公司在泰国推出了两只旗舰 ETF，为泰国投资者提供了购买一篮子中国蓝筹股和科技股的便利。【原文：China Asset Management Co. (ChinaAMC), the country's biggest provider of exchange-traded funds, said on Monday it launched two flagship ETFs in Thailand, giving Thai investors easy access to a basket of Chinese blue-chip and technology stocks.】

item.title: 中国将从 2026 年起降低部分产品的进口关税
item.description: 中国周一宣布从明年起调整部分产品的关税，包括降低锂离子电池回收黑粉等资源性商品的进口关税。【原文：China announced on Monday tariff adjustments for some products beginning next year, including lowering the import duties on resource-based commodities such as recycled black powder for lithium-ion batteries.】

item.title: 韩国 L&F 称与特斯拉的电池材料供应协议价值降至 7386 美元
item.description: 韩国电池材料制造商L&F周一表示，其与特斯拉达成的2023年供应协议价值已从早先预计的29亿美元缩水至7386美元。【原文：South Korean battery material maker L&F said on Monday the value of its 2023 supply deal with Tesla has shrunk to $7,386 from an earlier projection of $2.9 billion.】

item.title: 洞察力：特朗普与 30 万亿美元美国债券市场之间的脆弱和平
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "解放日 "关税在四月将美国债券市场推向反叛以来，他的政府一直在精心调整其政策和信息，以防止再次爆发。但一些投资者表示，休战局面依然脆弱。【原文：Since President Donald Trump's 'Liberation Day' tariffs pushed the U.S. bond market into revolt in April, his administration has carefully tailored its policies and messaging to prevent another flareup. But the truce remains fragile, some investors say.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，软银接近达成收购数据中心投资公司 DigitalBridge 的交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，软银正在就收购 DigitalBridge 进行深入谈判。【原文：SoftBank is in advanced talks to acquire DigitalBridge , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，VinFast-linked GSM 计划在香港上市，估值高达 30 亿美元
item.description: 两位消息人士称，越南电动汽车出租车运营商 GSM 计划在香港上市，这可能是东南亚国家的一家公司在香港的首次 IPO。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle taxi operator GSM, part of the Vingroup stable of companies, plans to list in Hong Kong in what could be the first IPO in the city by a firm from the Southeast Asian nation, two sources said.】

item.title: 中国 Leapmotor 目标十年内年销量超过 400 万台
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）制造商飞跃汽车公司（Leapmotor）首席执行官朱江明周一表示，公司预计在未来十年内年销量将超过400万辆。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) maker Leapmotor expects to sell more than 4 million vehicles a year within the next decade, CEO Zhu Jiangming said on Monday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，美国司法部利用反欺诈法锁定 DEI 上的公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，特朗普政府已对美国各大公司在招聘和晋升中使用多元化举措的情况展开调查。【原文：The Trump administration has launched investigations into the use of diversity initiatives in hiring and promotion at major U.S. companies, the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 押注美联储降息，亚洲股市上涨，贵金属创纪录
item.description: 周一，亚洲股市创下六周新高，美元则徘徊在近三个月来的最低点附近，原因是市场预期美联储明年将降息，这也引发了贵金属的强劲反弹。【原文：Asian stocks were at six-week highs on Monday, while the dollar hovered near its lowest in almost three months on expectations of the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates next year, which have also sparked a fierce rally in precious metals.】

item.title: 投资者权衡中东紧张局势，石油上涨
item.description: 周一亚洲早盘，油价上涨，原因是投资者考虑到中东紧张局势可能扰乱供应，而俄乌和谈仍存在重大障碍。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trading on Monday as investors weighed Middle East tensions that could disrupt supply, while a major hurdle remains in the Russia–Ukraine peace talks.】

item.title: 日本央行加息，日元局部回升，干预风险受到重视
item.description: 日元在上周末急剧下跌后，周一有所回升，因为市场权衡了日本进一步加息的时机以及在年末交易清淡的情况下进行干预的可能性。【原文：The yen recovered some ground on Monday following a steep drop at the end of last week as markets weighed the timing of more interest rate hikes in Japan and the possibility of intervention in thin end-of-year trading.】

item.title: 中国陆地空间公司（LandSpace）准备与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）一较高下
item.description: 中国的火箭初创公司陆地空间毫不掩饰自己从埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）获得了灵感。【原文：China's rocket startup LandSpace has made no secret about drawing inspiration from Elon Musk's SpaceX.】

item.title: Coupang 宣布因数据泄露向韩国用户赔偿 11.8 亿美元
item.description: 韩国电子商务公司 Coupang 周一宣布向 3370 万个账户的持有者提供 1.69 万亿韩元（11.8 亿美元）的赔偿方案，因为该公司的大规模数据泄漏事件引起了用户和立法者的反弹。【原文：South Korean e-commerce company Coupang announced on Monday a compensation package of 1.69 trillion won ($1.18 billion) to holders of 33.7 million accounts for a massive data leak that has drawn backlash from users and lawmakers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚星空娱乐公司首席财务官和首席运营官离职，新高管离职
item.description: 陷入困境的澳大利亚赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 周一表示，其首席财务官弗兰克-克里尔（Frank Krile）已经辞职，并将离开公司，即刻生效。【原文：Embattled Australian casino operator Star Entertainment said on Monday its Chief Financial Officer Frank Krile has resigned and will be leaving the firm, effective immediately.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国政府驯服全球铁矿石市场的内幕
item.description: 中国的国有铁矿石买家正对必和必拓等矿业巨头采取越来越强硬的手段，以加强对价值 1,320 亿美元的海运市场的控制，并为钢厂争取更好的条件，而此时一个巨大的新供应来源将加强其控制力。【原文：China's state iron ore buyer is using increasingly hardball tactics against mining giants such as BHP to tighten its grip on the $132 billion seaborne market and extract better terms for steel mills, just as a giant new source of supply is set to strengthen its hand.】
